amendment.description: To prohibit the leasing of Boeing 767 aircraft by the Air Force.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3445 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3445 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To prohibit the leasing of Boeing 767 aircraft by the Air Force.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3445 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
